resources.name: 1. [INTEGRATION] Auto-Create Nested Folders
resources.description: Create document with deep folder path - auto-creates all folders

resources.name: 2. [INTEGRATION] Create Folder Then Document
resources.description: Manual folder creation, then add document using folder_id

resources.name: 3. [INTEGRATION] Add Document to Folder
resources.description: Create document using folder_id from previous request

body.text:
{
  "project_id": "{{ _.project_id }}",
  "folder_id": "{{ _.weapons_folder_id }}",
  "folder_path": "Weapons",
  "name": "Stormcaller Blade",
  "content": "# Stormcaller Blade\n\nA legendary sword that channels lightning."
}

resources.name: 4. [PATH] Folder - Relative Path
resources.description: Create folder using relative path notation: 'Characters/Villains' creates both folders

resources.name: 5. [PATH] Folder - Absolute Path
resources.description: Create folder using absolute path notation: '/Magic/Spells' ignores folder_id

resources.name: 6. [PATH] Document - Relative Path
resources.description: Create document using relative path notation in name field

resources.name: 7. [PATH] Document - Absolute Path
resources.description: Create document using absolute path notation (ignores folder_id)

resources.name: 8. [PATH] Validation Errors
resources.description: Test edge cases - should return 400 for invalid paths like 'a//b', 'a/', etc.

resources.name: 1. Create Deeply Nested Document
resources.description: Create a document with deep path - auto-creates all folders in hierarchy

resources.name: 2. View Full Tree
resources.description: See the entire folder/document tree structure created

resources.name: 3. Create Folder Then Document
resources.description: First create a folder, then add document to it using folder_id

resources.name: 4. Add Document to Folder
resources.description: Create document using folder_id (from previous step)

resources.name: 5. Create Archive Folder
resources.description: Create an Archive folder to reorganize documents

resources.name: 6. Move Document to Archive
resources.description: Move Chapter 1 to the Archive folder
resources.afterResponseScript: console.log('✅ Document moved to Archive folder');

resources.name: 7. View Final Structure
resources.description: See the final reorganized tree structure

resources.name: 1. [VAL] Folder Name with Slash
resources.description: Should FAIL: folder names cannot contain slashes (400 validation error)

resources.name: 2. [VAL] Rename Folder with Slash
resources.description: Should FAIL: folder names cannot contain slashes (400 validation error)

resources.name: 3. [VAL] Document without folder_path or folder_id
resources.description: Should FAIL: must provide at least one of folder_path or folder_id (400)

resources.name: 4. [VAL] Project with Empty Name
resources.description: Should FAIL: project name is required (400)

resources.name: 5. [VAL] Project Name Too Long
resources.description: Should FAIL: project name exceeds max length (400)

resources.name: 1. [PRIORITY] Create - folder_id Wins
resources.description: When both folder_id and folder_path provided, folder_id takes priority

body.text:
{
  "project_id": "{{ _.project_id }}",
  "folder_path": "Characters",
  "folder_id": "{{ _.folder_id }}",
  "name": "Priority Test Document",
  "content": "# Testing Priority\n\nThis document should be in the folder_id location, NOT Characters."
}

resources.name: 2. [PRIORITY] Move - folder_id Wins
resources.description: When both folder_id and folder_path provided in update, folder_id wins

resources.name: 1. [ERROR] Delete Project with Documents
resources.description: Should FAIL: Cannot delete project that has documents (409 conflict)

resources.name: 2. [ERROR] Get Nonexistent Document
resources.description: Should return 404 for document that doesn't exist

resources.name: 3. [ERROR] Get Nonexistent Folder
resources.description: Should return 404 for folder that doesn't exist

resources.name: 4. [ERROR] Create Duplicate Folder Name
resources.description: Should FAIL: Cannot create folder with same name in same location (409 conflict)

resources.name: 5. [ERROR] Create Duplicate Document Name
resources.description: Should FAIL: Cannot create document with same name in same folder (409 conflict)

resources.name: Integration
resources.description: Cross-feature integration tests

resources.name: Workflows
resources.description: Realistic end-to-end user scenarios

resources.name: Edge Cases - Validations
resources.description: Input validation tests (should return 400)

resources.name: Edge Cases - Priority Tests
resources.description: Test folder_id vs folder_path priority logic

resources.name: Edge Cases - Error Paths
resources.description: Error handling tests (404, 409, etc.)

resources.name: File System - Advanced Testing
resources.description: Integration tests, workflows, edge cases, and error scenarios
